conversion_verification.notes: Excellent isometric-style 3D conversion with consistent wall heights and clear interior volumes.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Walls rendered with thickness and height; excellent cutaway treatment.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Highly accurate layout fidelity. All rooms, partitions, and stair geometry match the source exactly. Minor loss on very small wall indent transitions.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement matches the 2D cues for kitchen, living, dining, and bedroom almost perfectly.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean rendering with soft lighting. Minus 1 point for somewhat low-contrast floor-to-wall separation in some corners.

detected_errors.description: Minor simplification of the exterior entrance steps compared to the 2D plan.

summary: An exceptionally faithful 3D conversion that preserves the exact geometry and furniture layout of the original floor plan.
